trans-unit.source: Create app passwords in the Myapps portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Create app passwords in the Myapps portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page shows users how they can create additional app passwords in the Myapps portal.
trans-unit.target: This page shows users how they can create additional app passwords in the Myapps portal.

trans-unit.source: Create app passwords in the myapps 365 portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Create app passwords in the myapps 365 portal for Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: If you do not use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 have an Azure subscription then you will want to create app passwords through myapps portal.
trans-unit.target: If you do not use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 have an Azure subscription then you will want to create app passwords through myapps portal.

trans-unit.source: To create app passwords if you do not have an Office 365 or Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: To create app passwords if you do not have an Office 365 or Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: Click on your user name and select Additional Security Verification.
trans-unit.target: Click on your user name and select Additional Security Verification.

trans-unit.source: On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords
trans-unit.target: On the proofup page, at the top, select app passwords

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for the app password and click **Next**
trans-unit.target: Enter a name for the app password and click **Next**

trans-unit.source: Copy the app password to the clipboard and paste it into your app.
trans-unit.target: Copy the app password to the clipboard and paste it into your app.
